scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w web
scripts.test: npm run test -w shared && npm run test -w server && npm run test -w web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w shared && npm run typecheck -w server && npm run typecheck -w web
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w web"
